00029 namespace RDK2 { namespace SensorData {
00030 
00031 struct SonarDevice {
00032     SonarDevice() : reading(0.0), counter(0), new_reading(false) { }
00033     std::string name;
00034     RDK2::Geometry::Point2od devicePose; 
00035     double reading;
00036     int counter;
00037     bool new_reading;
00038 };
00039 
00040 
00041 struct SonarData: public BaseSensorData {
00042     SonarData() : minReading(0.0), maxReading(0.0) { }
00044     double minReading, maxReading;
00045     typedef std::vector<SonarDevice> SonarDevices;
00046     SonarDevices devices;
00047 };
